scheme_name: Canara Robeco Bluechip Equity Fund Direct Growth
exit_load:
Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 1 year.
Same for SIP.
description: The fund seeks to provide capital appreciation by predominantly investing in companies having a large market capitalization. Canara Robeco Large cap+ fund is named to reflect the investment strategy, which is mainly focused on a portfolio that would be concentrated on investing in any of the top 150 stocks ranked on the basis of market capitalization.

analysis.analysis_desc: 5Y and 10Y annualised returns higher than category average

amc_info.name: Canara Robeco Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 4th Floor - Construction House,5 - Walchand Hirachand Marg, Mumbai 400001
amc_info.description: Canara Robeco Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 19/12/1987 and its managing total assets of â‚¹11,895 Cr. Its ranked at 20 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Canara Robeco is a Asset management company is a joint venture between Canara Bank and Robeco, a Dutch asset management company. Canara Robeco is the second oldest mutual fund in the country and was started in December 1987 (As Canara Mutual Fund).

Canara Robeco Mutual Fund presents a wide variety of funds in various different categories such as equity, debt and hybrid and income. Being a trusted brand, it strongly believes in providing world class investment services to all its customers. As of June 2018, the Asset Under Management of the company is Rs.1,337,458.48.

The equity shareholding structure comprises of Canara Bank owning 51% shares and Robeco Group owning 49% shares. Being one of the oldest mutual fund companies, it has made its mark in the mutual fund industry through its constant and stable performance across different market capitalization.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
